title: Can't login 5.14
body: Ever since this latest patch I can no longer get past the login. It just says: connection failure unable to connect to the pvp.net server. My friend seems to be able to get on just fine but I can't. I tried making another account quick and I can't with that one either same thing. I tried making a third on the NA server and it works fine. It directs me to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944 and I had tried all of them and none work. Tried reinstalling, no change. I only started playing again a few days ago so the download files I have are pretty fresh, it's just this patch I guess. Using windows by the way.

replies.body:
Hey holic77, 

Can you make sure that you've added League of Legends as an exception to any firewalls/antivirus applications that you may have running? 

Otherwise, please try the solutions in the following two Riot Games Support articles: 
- [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)
- [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)
Have you also done the Troubleshooting Connection Issues?
